title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person complaining about his leg, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dead person complaining about his leg This vision is one of the mysterious visions and can be interpreted to show that the deceased complaining about his leg is deprived of begging by his relatives and it can also show a debt that he has not paid. People who were close to him in his life. Seeing a dead person complaining about his leg. Many scholars differed in its interpretation of seeing a dead person complaining about his leg, as some of them said that the dead person is his bond, so it means that the dead person lacks supplication or charity. However, if seeing the dead person was injured or was afflicted, denotes the debts of the deceased that have not been paid or paid on his behalf. If a woman sees her dead husband complaining about her husband in a dream, this means that this woman is doing something that displeases God and brings shame to her deceased husband. This vision is considered one of the visions that carry some warning signs for this woman. It should be noted that seeing the deceased in general in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and happiness in the life of God, and this happens in the event that the deceased was a person close to the fortuneteller, so this vision is considered one of the visions that carry some warning signs for this woman. Visions that carry multiple interpretations, including good and evil. Seeing a dead person complaining about his leg by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a dead person complaining about his leg as an indication of the dead person’s need for prayers from his relatives and his memory. It is also an indication of the dead person’s need for charity and forgiveness. This indicates that the one who was supported by the dead will fall into great distress in the coming period. If the vision of the deceased complaining about his leg and the fortuneteller is far from him, this may indicate that there will be great comfort and abundance of livelihood that the fortuneteller will receive, and in the event that one sees that he is visiting graves in a dream While visiting the graves, he saw a dead person complaining about his leg. This vision is an indication that goodness and happiness will soon come to that person’s life. Seeing a dead person complaining about his leg by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing a dead person complaining about his leg as an indication that the dreamer is facing many problems and needs someone to rely on. To help him solve his crises, and this is the case when that dead person is the father of the dreamer. Ibn Shaheen also said that seeing a dead person complaining about his leg is a sign of the dead person’s need to pray and seek forgiveness from the fortuneteller. If the dead person complains about his leg and a trace of blood is found on his leg, this indicates... That there is some money and profits that the fortuneteller can obtain. Seeing the dead person complaining about his leg with the piece. Scientists have interpreted seeing the dead person complaining about his leg for an unmarried woman as an indication that marriage will be postponed or that he will not achieve what he dreamed of. The girl prays and asks for forgiveness and gives charity for his soul. In addition, this vision includes good news for this girl that her wedding date is approaching and that goodness and happiness will come to her life in general, because seeing dead people in a dream means goodness and happiness for the fortuneteller. Seeing a dead person complaining about his leg for a married woman. Seeing a dead person complaining about her husband for a married woman is evidence of some problems that she will face. In the coming period, the married woman will be exposed to betrayal and pain from some close friends and will be captured by her. To them. If a married woman sees a dead person complaining about her husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying in an unclean place

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing praying in an unclean place in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried woman start praying in an unclean place, and she continues to know this. A sign that she will do a lot of immoral things in her life and needs to be supported. If she prays in an unclean place in her dream, and she did not know this In the dream. Here the meaning is different: she is walking on an unclear path in which there is good from bad in her life. She must return to the people of the male, ask them for help, and find out what is going on with her life. The unmarried woman prays with her close friends in an unclean place in the dream and she was happy. It indicates that he lives with some people in the bad deeds and bad deeds in their lives. It also indicates that he is going in the wrong direction, that it is dark, and there is no easy way to return to it. Read also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream and its importance according to NabulusInterpretation of attending prayer in an unclean place in a dream For a married woman: Seeing a married woman praying in an unclean place in a dream and knowing it is an indication of her acceptance of doing forbidden things in her life and her lack of fear of God and His punishment, and God knows best. It also indicates that she is walking on the path of sin in her life and does so in front of everyone without shame. And the married woman who She prayed in an unclean place inside her house and was happy. It indicates that she has started doing things that are not good in her life and she will feel very sorry for that. Likewise, the dreamer prays with her husband in the dream and she knows that the place is unclean in the dream. A sign that she lives with her husband in Very sad things, and they will regret them even more. It also indicates that he has engaged in some bad deeds and must stop doing so. Interpretation of seeing praying in an unclean place in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that she is praying in an unclean place and divorces her, she would look at it in a dream. A sign that she is doing a lot of immoral things, and things that do not apply to her life at this time. It also indicates that he will fall into many misfortunes from which there is no easy recovery, and God knows best. Either she sees the divorced woman knowing that the place is unclean and begins praying for her in the dream. She explains that she She will make a big mistake in her life and she will have to ask God for forgiveness and return to Him. It also indicates that he is walking on a path of reprehensible immorality and sins without realizing it. It also indicates that a divorced woman prays with her divorced woman in an unclean place in a dream and she is happy. An indication of He is committing immoral acts with his divorced wife at this time and he must leave her. It also indicates that she is wrong about herself and herself in life and needs to think carefully. Interpretation of seeing prayer in an unclean place in a dream for a man and its meaningIf a person prays in an unclean place in a dream, and realizes this in the dream. Sign However, he will start forbidden actions in his life, and he is going on this path. It also shows that he will be exposed to some new bad things in his life and he will have to think. The man who sees that he is praying in a dream and the place is unclean in the dream and completes it. It is announced that he will take a lot of forbidden money in his life. And he enters it into his body, and God knows best. Thus, the man who sees himself starting with...

title: Interpretation of the name Abdullah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Abdullah in a dream. In the following lines, we will show the interpretation of a dream about the name Abdullah in a dream and the good or bad it brings. All this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about the name Abdullah in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Abdullah in a dream can be a reference to goodness and living, and God is Most High. And know that when an unmarried girl sees the name Abdullah, it may be an indication of the satisfaction of desires, and God knows the unseen. And if a married man sees the name Abdullah, it may express the attainment of a high rank, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees the name Abdullah, this may indicate her reaching a high rank, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a name. Prince in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about the name Amir in a dream could be an indication of the dreamer’s high status among people, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the name Amir, this can lead to goodness and progress, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a young man named Amir may indicate that he has reached a high rank. And God knows best. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl named Amir may indicate her promotion to a high position, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Shihab in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Shihab in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. In the event that a young man sees the name Shihab, it may indicate problems that He faces her, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the name Shihab, this may lead to trouble, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees the name of a five-pointed star, this may indicate a problem, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name of a princess in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name of a princess in a dream could be an indication of a high status, and God knows best. I know the unseen, while if the dreamer sees the name of a princess, this may indicate that she enjoys a high status, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the name of a princess, this may be evidence of her reaching a high status, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees the name of a princess, this may indicate what she expects from a prestigious position. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the name Nour in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the name Nour in a dream could be an indication of goodness, and God knows the unseen. But if a married man sees the name Nour, it may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the name Nour in a dream, it can This is evidence that she will be free of worries, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees the name Nour, it may indicate good morals, and God Almighty is above all things. Interpretation of a dream about the name Iman in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the name Iman in a dream could mean freedom from worries, and God knows best. Likewise, if The dreamer saw the name Iman, it may mean getting rid of problems, God willing. If the young man sees the name Iman, it may express steadfastness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Iman can also indicate safety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Najla in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for the name Najla in a dream could be a sign. To the good, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the name Najla, it may indicate marriage to a righteous woman, and God knows best. When he sees a married woman, the name Najla may indicate death.

title: Interpretation of fire in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi’s accurate interpretations

preview.html: In today’s article, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for single people through the Encyclopedia website, with reference to what Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi interpreted regarding the meaning of the vision. We see the great interest among girls in interpreting their dreams through continuous research in search engines, as the issue of interpretation of seeing fire in a dream is Most of the questions they seek to know the meaning of the signs. . Try to understand the dream and its signs that indicate that good intentions are coming into her life, otherwise she will be hurt. According to Imam Ibn Sirin and Imam Nabulsi for the vision in the following lines. The symbol of fire in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees the outbreak of fire in her dream. This vision shows this girl getting married as soon as possible, during the same year. But when an unmarried woman dreams in a dream that her house is burning. This vision symbolizes that her life will change a lot for the better and that she will begin a life free of problems. Some interpreters of dreams and visions have shown that seeing fire in a dream for unmarried women burning her belongings is evidence of the girl’s maturity and that her life will change for the better. Seeing an unmarried woman burning while eating her house indicates Her relationship with those around her improves and differences for the better emerge in her personality. Seeing a fire in a girl’s dream means that she will get married and live a happy life soon. Seeing a girl with someone in a dream, and she is burning, is evidence that there are competitors between her and this person. An unmarried woman’s attempt to control On the fire until it goes out is a sign that the girl is seeking to take a step forward in her life’s affairs and change her behavior and living system for the better, but she is still in a state of hesitation and anxiety. Seeing a woman with fire in her body indicates that her life is full of problems and difficulties and that she is going through psychological crises. Seeing a girl suggests that she was struck by fire and surrounded by problems, in addition to her suffering from conflict with people in her life. Seeing her lighting a fire to prepare food is evidence of the stability of her life, both physically and psychologically. Seeing a single woman holding a fire in her hands is evidence of her strong personality and her ability to overcome problems and solve them from their roots. Seeing a girl trying to light a candle is a sign of upcoming successes in her life and that she will excel in her field of work and may be rewarded with a promotion. Interpretation of seeing fire in one’s dream for a son Sirin: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there are fires in her house. This vision shows the imminent marriage of this girl. Seeing the girl in her dream burning fire on her clothes. This vision symbolizes her tremendous success and the fulfillment of all her dreams and aspirations in the shortest period of time. But if she saw a fire in her dream, that fire was very intense. This vision indicates that this girl will get married shortly after experiencing a wonderful love story. Ibn Sirin explained that the presence of fire in a dream is evidence of food because of its many meanings and uses in life. He showed the world that fire is a symbol of hell and the torment in it, so that it can It is a sign from God to the dreamer that he has renounced the sins he is committing and must atone for his sins and return to God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about a small black snake in a dream, and interpretation of a dream about a big black snake

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a dream indicates bad luck and bad events, but there are some rare cases in which if a person sees a black snake, the vision will appear positive, and these cases are presented in detail in the following article and we will explain the strongest indications that Ibn Sirin said about the snake or serpent in a dream, follow the following. You have a dream that confuses you and you are waiting for it .. Google Egyptian website for interpreting dreams Interpretation of a dream about a black snake The black snake in a dream shows the malicious enemy from relatives or close acquaintances, even if it is more than one head, it is an enemy with more than one strength, that is, it will be from the people of influence, money and great social status, and these matters make the dreamer's chance of defeating him very difficult, but if he turns to God Almighty and asks Him to save him from the hand of this enemy, the Lord of the Worlds will stand by him and save him, as long as his opponents are strong. When the dreamer screams while seeing a black beard in a dream, he fears confronting his enemies as well as the harm that will befall them. One of the jurists said that the black snake indicates magic The black devil. The black snake approaching the dreamer in a dream means that dangers and difficulties will approach him, and the further away from him the better the vision is than the previous one, and it shows that the danger is far away, and this gives him a strong opportunity to escape from it. Psychologists said that seeing snakes indicates conflicts and psychological disturbances that the viewer has been exposed to in his life. When the dreamer sees a familiar person with his head as if he is alive in a dream, he is one of the evil ones, and the dreamer is only told to stay away from him, and not reveal any secrets to him, because he is malicious and untrustworthy. If the dreamer sees the black snake and releases a lot of poison from its mouth, the dream shows the dreamer's most dangerous enemies who use the most terrible and most ferocious methods to achieve their heinous goals by destroying his life. Interpretation of the dream of the black snake by Ibn Sirin It is not good to see the house full of black snakes, because the house may be full of jinn and demons, and the dreamer may be the reason for the demons entering the house through his many sins, avoiding prayer and not practicing worship in general. If the dreamer sees large black snakes or snakes in a dream, and he reads the Qur’an out loud and sees that the snakes decrease in size until they disappear completely, this is a message from the Creator that the demons of his house will come out with insistence in reciting the Qur’an. When one sees a black snake in a dream, and it swallows the dreamer in his stomach, this is a calamity in which he drowns, and he tries to escape from it a lot, but it is a big problem, and only God is able to save him from this, as he may be involved in a lawsuit or a serious financial crisis, and God knows best. Seeing a black snake in a dream and confronting it and not being afraid of it is evidence of the dreamer’s steadfastness and his ability to remove all his crises and problems from his path to defend himself from the evil of the jinn and demons. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake? Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single woman

Psychologists have said that seeing snakes indicates conflicts and psychological disorders that the viewer has been exposed to in his life. When the dreamer sees a familiar person with his head as if he is alive In the dream, he is one of the evil ones, and the dreamer is only told to stay away from him, and not reveal any secrets to him, because he is malicious and untrustworthy. If the dreamer sees the black snake and it releases a lot of poison from its mouth, then the dream shows the dreamer’s most dangerous enemies who use the most terrible and terrible methods. Ferocity to achieve their heinous goals by destroying his life. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake by Ibn Sirin: It is not good to see the house full of black snakes, because the house may be full of jinn and devils, and the dreamer may be the reason for the devils entering the house through his many sins, avoiding prayer and not practicing worship in general. . If the dreamer sees large black snakes or snakes in a dream, recites the Qur’an out loud and sees that the snakes decrease in size until they disappear completely, then this is a message from the Creator that the demons of his house will come out with insistence in reciting the Qur’an. When one sees a black snake in a dream, and it swallows The dreamer is in his stomach, then this is a misfortune that he is drowning in, and he tries to escape from it a lot, but it is a big problem, and only God is capable. To save him from this, he may be involved in a lawsuit or a serious financial crisis, and God knows best. Seeing a black snake in a dream and facing it and not being afraid of it is evidence of the dreamer’s steadfastness and ability to remove all his crises and problems from his path to defend himself from the evil of the jinn and devils. What is the interpretation? Dream of a black snake? Interpretation of a dream of a black snake for a woman, Al-Az

title: Giving a veil in a dream to a married woman

preview.html: Through our talk today about the interpretation of visions and dreams, we will present the interpretation of seeing the veil according to each case. Interpretation of a vision of giving the veil in a dream to a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees that a stranger is giving her the case in a dream. The vision may indicate that he is characterized by honesty and trust and is famous among people for his religiosity. Such as Seeing an unknown man giving a veil to an unmarried girl. It is one of those dreams that portends goodness, and good luck in general. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that one of her acquaintances gave her a veil in a dream. It is a sign that she will marry this person, or that she will marry someone Someone with the same standards as you see this man. The meaning of seeing a black veil given in an unmarried girl’s dream can be dropped. Entering a new phase will make her life better with the help of God Almighty. Giving a white veil to a girl in a dream. A sign of success in work or study, and perhaps success in The life of the person who had the vision. See also: Interpretation of dreams about buying the hijab for single women. Interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the husband wearing the hijab for a married woman is examined. Among the dreams that indicate friendship and understanding between the husband and his wife. If a married woman sees herself in a dream taking the hijab from Her father. You will get what you want from the goals that you were looking for in waking life. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that she is giving a veil to someone she does not know. She will get what she wants by creating a jacket that she would like to hear in the past. Regarding the interpretation of seeing receiving or giving Hijab, in case a woman faces some problems in reality, and she sees that she is receiving a white veil in a dream. The vision may indicate stability and happiness that she will have in the coming days. Seeing the veil being removed from a beautiful person in a dream may symbolize a married woman. For what you enjoy An act of blessing and goodness, God willing. Interpretation of a vision of giving a man the hijab in a dream and its meaning. If a married man sees himself wearing the hijab in a dream. He and his wife will attain great goodness and the situation will change for the better with the help of God Almighty. But if the married man sees that he is giving the strange woman the hijab, And he wears it in a dream. It will be a reason for guiding some people to the path of justice and goodness in this world. If a married man gives the hijab to his daughter in a dream. It is an indication of the wrong path that this daughter is taking and that there is someone directing her to the right path. While seeing the hijab being given to an unknown woman In a dream for a married man. This means that many changes are happening to the visionary. If the married man is going through some difficulties and problems that hinder some things in his life, and he sees that he is giving the white veil to his wife in a dream. The vision indicated the end of those crises that existed in the life of the visionary. And disposing of all of them. Read also: Wearing the hijab in a dream for a married woman. Meaning and interpretation of seeing wearing the hijab in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing the hijab in a dream for a pregnant woman gives the effect of proof. It indicates the husband’s vision of Hajj.

title: Interpretation of a dream about ice cream

preview.html: Interpretation of ice cream in a dream indicates the coming goodness and joy that the dreamer will enjoy. Calmness and confidence. The greater the amount of ice cream in the dream, this indicates many positive events in the life of the fortuneteller. Below is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Eating Ice CreamSeeing ice cream in a dream means kindness, future joy that the dreamer sees, and peace of mind for him. The more ice cream the viewer sees, it means that happy events will come true soon. If the ice cream spoils, this indicates bad news and leads to a financial or health crisis. If someone sees that he is buying ice cream, it means that he will get a prestigious job. If the dreamer sees that ice cream has fallen to the ground, this means that the dreams he is looking for will not come true. Offering ice cream in a dream shows how much the dreamer loves making dreams come true. The taste of ice cream for the fortuneteller indicates the pursuit of dreams. Interpretation of seeing ice cream for one girl. If one girl sees that she is eating a lot of ice cream in a dream, this means that she dreams of achieving things that are far from her. But if he sees ice cream in a dream, this means that he will get rid of Of stress, tension, and fear. As for a girl’s dream of ice cream, this indicates a lot of joy that will enter her life. Seeing ice cream for an unmarried girl indicates marriage to a person of good character. Interpretation of seeing ice cream for a married woman. As for the dream of ice cream for a married woman in cold weather, It indicates that she is exposed to some risks. If a married woman is seen eating ice cream with her husband, this indicates that their relationship is strong and that the wife loves her husband. Interpretation of seeing ice cream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating ice cream and loves its taste, this indicates her joy If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying ice cream for a child, this indicates the joy that will come in the near future, and that she will give birth to a healthy child. If a pregnant woman sees ice cream in her dream, this indicates a lot of abundant nutrition and quality. But if While he is eating ice cream, this indicates that it is easy to give it to a new baby. Interpretation of seeing ice cream for a divorced woman: But if a divorced woman sees ice cream in her dream, this indicates great happiness in her life. As for the dream of ice cream for a divorced woman, she will get rid of worries and sorrows. Soon. It also indicates that a great reward will come to her in the previous days. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a man’s dream. The interpretation of eating ice cream in a man’s dream also indicates a meaning that indicates good news and good things that will enter his life. Seeing ice cream for a man in a dream indicates The desires that he dreams about. Seeing him eating ice cream with his wife indicates the stability of marital life between them. But if he sees that he is buying ice cream for his wife, this shows his great love for his wife. Seeing ice cream means peace of mind for the man. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream

title: Seeing one of God’s righteous saints in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Since seeing a guardian from God’s righteous parents is one of the visions that indicate goodness and what corresponds to it, in this interpretation we will provide you with the details of the vision through gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a guard from God’s righteous guards in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees She is naked, the righteous guardian gives her something she does not know in the dream. She will marry a righteous man who fears God and she will have victory. As for the unmarried girl who sees that her righteous guardian dreams of her hand. It is a sign that she will know in the correct way the things that are happening in her life. Perhaps it was Something chaotic in her life she will know. If he sees that he is marrying someone he loves and a good guardian comes with a smile on his face, then I have an unmarried girl in a dream. She announced that she will live a quiet and happy life and that the person she will marry is a good and pious person. She was talking with a good guardian in a girl’s dream She is unmarried and was speaking to him fluently while he was listening to her. The vision showed a lot of good news that makes her better off and may indicate that she is an influential person. Seeing a guard from God’s righteous guards in an unmarried girl’s dream is interpreted to overcome the difficulties in her life, otherwise It will change the situation for the better with the help of God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of seeing sheikhs and preachers in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a guard from God’s righteous guards in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in a dream her righteous guardian, this leads to many good interpretations. As the vision shows improvement In the circumstances of the individual and it changes from one situation to the better. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that she is talking to her righteous guardian. The vision shows that she is a person who acts wisely and logically in all matters of her life. If she sees that she is crying in front of her righteous guardian and complaining about her worries in a dream for a married woman. The meaning of the vision is that he wants to talk about what is in us to an honest person, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, if a married woman faces some problems that concern her, whether family or personal, and she sees that her righteous guardian is laughing at her in a dream. All her problems will be solved, and she will become stable in her life. And live a peaceful life. Seeing a righteous guardian giving money to a married woman in a dream is a sign that she will obtain a lot of sustenance thanks to the grace of Almighty God. The laughter of a righteous guardian in a married woman’s dream indicates relief from anxiety and relief from worries. Interpretation of seeing a guard from God’s guards Righteous people in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a married man sees one of God’s righteous guardians, this is a sign of good news. If a married man is going through difficult financial circumstances, and sees in a dream a righteous guardian who gives her some money in a dream. It is a clear indication that all their financial problems will be solved and dealt with. As for seeing a good guardian laughing in a married man’s dream, this is a sign that he has heard good news that will change his life for the better. Since seeing a good guardian in any man’s dream gives a lot of good news to any opinion, it is certainly no different in a married man’s dream. Seeing the

title: Interpretation and interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation and interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream. It is one of the dreams that many people can see and search for an interpretation of it because the imam of the mosque indicates piety and good morals. There are many interpretations of this type of dream, as a person’s life can change for the better. In a dream, the connotations and interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream. There is much evidence that seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream indicates this, and among these interpretations and connotations are the following: If a person sees that he is riding with the imam in a car, then the interpretation of his dream is that he will follow the advice of the imam, and follow the teachings of his religion, Such as helping others, preaching goodness, and he obeys. He assumed the position of imam after that. If a person sees in a dream that the imam of the mosque is looking at him, the interpretation of this is that the opinion will fulfill his future dreams and goals, in addition to the blessing of profit from his work, and the removal of worry and sorrow. From his heart, and his condition will improve for the better, God willing. Follow the evidence and interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream. As for seeing the imam wearing white clothes, a smiling face, and radiating light in a dream, the thinker will have many good things soon and he will hear news that will make him happy as well. As for seeing the imam wearing the green dress, this It indicates a lot of sustenance awaiting the opinion of his household, and that he will draw closer to God with good deeds. As for seeing the imam with a thick beard in a dream, it indicates the imminence of achieving what he seeks in the coming period of his life, and achieving what God Almighty calls for. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque In a dream: As for Ibn Sirin’s opinion and interpretation of dreaming about seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream, it has several connotations, including: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a person praying next to the imam indicates the high status of the opinion in the future and his transition to a better position in his social and professional life. As for whoever sees himself praying behind the imam, This indicates the fulfillment of his desires that he desired and prayed for, the fulfillment of what he wants, and the satisfaction of his needs in the next period of his life. But if a man sees that he is the imam of the pilgrims, the vision indicates his high status among the people and that there are many good things waiting for him in his life, and it may indicate Accordingly, he will provide benefits to people in various matters of their lives and provide advice in matters of religion and this world. As for someone who sees that he is an imam but is moving in a direction contrary to the legitimate Qiblah, this indicates that the person is following his heresy or that he will be exposed to a situation in which he will betray someone close to him, and in this Situation The opinion must repent to God Almighty in everything he does in order to obtain forgiveness. Follow Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an unmarried young man in a dream as an imam as an indication that he will get married very soon, especially if the imam is in the vision. He is also wearing white and there was light around him in the dream. As for the student who saw the imam in the dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as an indication that this student will obtain high grades and that God will grant him success in his studies and excel in his education. If one sees in a dream that he is praying People to pray, the

title: Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane Driving a plane is an enjoyable thing for many people, especially if the person dreams of traveling and moving around, whether for a walk or work. Interpretation experts, such as witnesses of falling or being exposed to a major accident, what are the most important interpretations of a dream about boarding a plane, and this is what we answer in our topic. Interpretation of a dream about flying a planeDream experts say that boarding a plane carries many positive signs for the sleeper, and Faisal will receive a great honor or a promotion that matters to him at work. When a student sees himself riding a plane during a dream and is the pilot in it, the interpretation indicates many beautiful characteristics and things as he reaches his academic goals early and achieves some dreams that he has longed for. It indicates success in general and a person’s good control over his circumstances and life. Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains many details about riding a plane in a dream and says that it is a sign of kindness and good news about the outstanding practical success that one achieves. Ibn Sirin confirms that riding a plane In a dream, it can be a promising and beautiful sign, especially if one can reach the place he wants through it. However, if a major accident occurs or the person is exposed to many risks while driving, he can collide with many things that hurt him, whether it is at work. Or in his personal life, which means that there are some problems that will rule his days if he gets sick while driving a plane. Interpretation of dreams about boarding a plane for single womenMost likely, the girl has had many dreams during her life and she is very keen to make them come true. Among the signs of a single woman boarding a plane In a dream, it indicates that a new project will soon start in her life. According to the shape of the plane, the attribute is interpreted as a large plane that shows the size of a large project and success during its duration, but if the plane is small it may happen that he will enter into a small but profitable business and reap from it. In an accident, she finds many obstacles and can enter a difficult period of despair, so she has to fight until she regains her psychological integrity. Interpretation of a dream about riding a plane for a married woman: Experts explain that riding a plane in a dream for a married woman is a sign of pregnancy and she thinks about it in some cases, but Provided that she boards the plane without feeling fear or extreme emotion, and if the woman is sick and sitting on board. The meaning of the plane and its arrival at its destination indicates improvement and speed of recovery. But if she finds that the plane landed where it was heading and she was surprised by its beautiful and beautiful appearance, then this indicates the good days that she is living and the happy times between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane for a pregnant woman: The pregnant woman will be surprised if she finds herself driving An airplane in a dream, and scientists say that the interpretation promises her to overcome physical problems and difficult psychological situations, meaning that she will be reassured and in good condition if she is able to board the plane. The plane left and did not see any accident during that time

Interpretation of dreams about boarding a plane for single womenMost likely, the girl has had many dreams during her life and she is very keen to make them come true. Among the signs of a single woman boarding a plane In a dream, it indicates that a new project will soon start in her life. According to the shape of the plane, the attribute is interpreted as a large plane that shows the size of a large project and success during its duration, but if the plane is small it may happen that he will enter into a small but profitable business and reap from it. In an accident, she finds many obstacles and can enter a difficult period of despair, so she has to fight until she regains her psychological integrity. Interpretation of a dream about riding a plane for a married woman: Experts explain that riding a plane in a dream for a married woman is a sign of pregnancy and she thinks about it in some cases, but Provided that she boards the plane without feeling fear or extreme emotion, and if the woman is sick and sitting on board. The meaning of the plane and its arrival at its destination indicates improvement and speed of recovery. But if she finds that the plane landed where it was heading and she was surprised by its beautiful and beautiful appearance, then this indicates the good days that she is living and the happy times between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane for a pregnant woman: The pregnant woman will be surprised if she finds herself driving An airplane in a dream, and scientists say that the interpretation promises her to overcome physical problems and difficult psychological situations, meaning that she will be reassured and in good condition if she is able to board the plane. The plane left and did not see any accident during that time
